hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Mas'ud narrated:"Allah's Messenger would say the Takbir for every lowering and raising, standing and sitting, and (so did) Abu Bakr and Umar

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّكْبِيرِ عِنْدَ الرُّكُوعِ وَالسُّجُودِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Takbir For The Bowing And Prostration Positions
